About the Luxury Charter Group

Welcome into our world of personalised luxury yacht charters.... anywhere in the world

Luxury Holidays on the Water... You need go no further!

The Luxury Charter Group has all the resources to provide the best solution for your charter holiday on the water.  We have something for everyone. With access to over 3000 charter yachts in destinations worldwide, we'll hand-pick the best yacht/s to meet your personal criteria, only yachts that we have already personally inspected and chosen for our valued clients.

From your first enquiry onwards Luxury Charter Group will ensure your holiday planning is easy and enjoyable.  Our Team is available 24/7.

No matter where you are in the world and no matter where you want to go in the world, our aim is for you to have the best imaginable charter experience in your chosen piece of paradise:   be it the Mediterranean, Caribbean, Bahamas,  the islands of the South Pacific or beyond.

We bring you our highly personalised service and our combined knowledge of more than 40 years of experience in the charter of luxury yachts

Leave everything to us, whether you charter for a week, a month or more.

It's that easy!

How We Help You to Plan your Private Yacht Charter

We have the world covered, our Charter Managers, either Sharon in America, Radek in Europe or Jeni in Australia, are available around the clock to attend to every phase of planning your personal and private yacht charter

From the moment you make first contact with us, we will carefully listen to every detail of your desires for your private charter in your dream location.  We will advise the best options and mould them into an itinerary on the most suitable vessel that meets your criteria, in the destination of your dreams.

We are the only 'Port of Call' you need to make to plan your luxury charter holiday.

No matter where you in the world you are, we are operational 24/7 so we can serve you, and respond to your requests, as quickly as possible

Our Point of Difference

Our unique knowledge and experience of marine travel equips us to advise you with confidence about your dream charter.  We'll match the right boat in the destination of your dreams.

Luxury Charter Group stands as an independent global charter organisation which has a vast and varied portfolio of yachts available for your consideration.  The yachts we offer have already met our strict criteria by our own personal inspection.  We inspect at least 400 yachts a year attending all the major international charter yacht shows worldwide, continually refreshing our knowledge to ensure you get the most up-to-date charter advice and expertise.

Each year our attendance at international charter shows includes inspection of yachts at Genoa, Greece, Turkey, Croatia, Cannes, Monaco, Tortola, Ft Lauderdale and Antigua.

Through our dedication and love of yachting, we have also personally explored and sailed many favourite charter destinations around the world.  Most recently we have personally cruised British Virgin islands and Antigua in the Caribbean, Bahamas;  Sicily and the Aeolian Islands, Amalfi Coast/ Gulf of Naples, Turkish Coastline, Greek Islands, Croatia's Dalmatian Coast, Corsica and Sardinia in Europe and  Galapagos, Tahiti, New Zealand and the Whitsunday islands of Australia in the South Pacific region
